amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a frontier extended stay clinic demonstration project.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1041 withdrawn in Senate.
Senate vitiated previous adoption of Amendment SA 1041 by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1041 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1041 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S8632-8633; text: CR S8633) To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a frontier extended stay clinic demonstration project.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1041 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Murkowski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1041 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
